ingredients.ingredient: 1 chorizo sausage link, casing removed and meat crumbled
2 tablespoons chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
2 tablespoons chopped onion, or to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste (Optional)

cookingTips: Remove chorizo casing and cook until browned and crispy
Warm tortillas directly over flame or in a dry skillet for better texture
Mince chipotle peppers for even heat distribution
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These street tacos are simple. Should I cook the chorizo first or add it raw to the tortillas?
